wiki.summary: “TILL FURTHER NOTICE” is the outro track to Travis Scott’s long-awaited fourth studio album, UTOPIA. It was initially made during a session for Metro Boomin’s HEROES & VILLAINS on August 20, 2019, and would have a demo version of it from that date surface online on May 10, 2023. It was revealed on July 22, 2023 at Travis' Rolling Loud set where it was displayed alongside 4 other titles in the fictional Utopian language from Thomas More’s 1516 book, Utopia. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “TILL FURTHER NOTICE” is the outro track to Travis Scott’s long-awaited fourth studio album, UTOPIA. It was initially made during a session for Metro Boomin’s HEROES & VILLAINS on August 20, 2019, and would have a demo version of it from that date surface online on May 10, 2023. It was revealed on July 22, 2023 at Travis' Rolling Loud set where it was displayed alongside 4 other titles in the fictional Utopian language from Thomas More’s 1516 book, Utopia. It is an eerie sign-off as Travis & James Blake, beg the question, where will we go now that we’re done with listening to UTOPIA, and the final words given to us — the listeners — informs us to stay posted with Travis until further notice of new music. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
